config.title: phpcs Path
config.description: This setting controls the executable path for the phpcs. You may specify the absolute path or workspace relative path to the phpcs executable.

config.title: Try to Auto Fix Issues
config.description: This setting controls if phpcbf should try to fix found issues.

config.title: phpcbf Path
config.description: This setting controls the executable path for the phpcbf. You may specify the absolute path or workspace relative path to the phpcbf executable.

config.title: Standard
config.description: This setting controls the coding standard used by phpcs. You may specify the name, absolute path or workspace relative path of the coding standard to use.

configWorkspace.title: Standard
configWorkspace.description: This setting controls the coding standard used by phpcs. You may specify the name, absolute path or workspace relative path of the coding standard to use.
